name: Metaverse Machine
description:
I always dreamed of finding a portal that would take me to a virtual world and experience adventures. Now the metaverse machine will start the new world. 

From the series "Stories of the metaverse".


Special thanks to "Pibe Tezos" for letting me use one of his characters in the poster.

Swap: 23:00hs UTC (29/11/2021)

Illustration: https://twitter.com/leMagnetismo

5920x7605 pixels - 300dpi
